newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bonn sets full Lufthansa privatisation.
newsitem.headline: Bonn sets full Lufthansa privatisation.

text.p: Germany's transport ministry said on Tuesday it had agreed draft laws that would permit full privatisation of Deutsche Lufthansa AG by introducing steps to ensure a majority of the airline would remain in German hands.
"I am confident that, with the help of this law, the (remaining state-owned stake) can be floated this year," Transport Minister Matthias Wissmann said in a statement.
